00037 void TNaIHit::SetFromTimingPulse(const TOctalFADCIsland& timePulse)
00038 {
00039   double timingClockPeriod = octalfadc_parameters.kClockPeriod[timePulse.GetFADCChannel()];
00040   double cftime = (timePulse.GetCFBlockTime()) * timingClockPeriod;
00041 
00042   SetTimingTime( cftime );
00043   if(nAverage> 1) { SetTimingAmp( timePulse.GetAverageMax(nAverage)); } else {SetTimingAmp( timePulse.GetMax());}
00044   // SetTimingAmp( timePulse.GetMax());
00045 
00046   SetTimingIsland( &timePulse );
00047   if(timePulse.GetPulseQuality()==3){SetNoisy(true);}
00048 }
00049  
00054 void TNaIHit::SetFromEnergyPulse(const TOctalFADCIsland& energyPulse)
00055 {
00056   double energyClockPeriod = octalfadc_parameters.kClockPeriod[energyPulse.GetFADCChannel()];
00057   double maxbintime = (energyPulse.GetMaxBinBlockTime()) * energyClockPeriod;
00058  
00059   SetEnergyTime( maxbintime );
00060   if(nAverage > 1) { SetEnergyAmp( energyPulse.GetAverageMax(nAverage)); } else {SetEnergyAmp( energyPulse.GetMax());}
00061   //SetEnergyAmp( energyPulse.GetMax());
00062   SetEnergyIsland( &energyPulse );
00063 }
